_comment: Configuration for each wiki command - customize text and URLs per command

host.text: Interested in hosting or promoting something in PA? Check out our guidelines first:

biweekly.text: Curious about our biweekly D&D games or need help creating a character? Start here:

wow.text: Curious about WoW? Check out the guide here:

hosted.text: Want to see which servers PA is currently hosting?

lfg.correct_channel_text: Looking for a group? Make sure to tag the game you're playing and check out the LFG channels!
lfg.wrong_channel_text:
Detected game role: **{role}**. This is not the correct channel, we have a dedicated channel here: {channel}.
Please grab the game-specific role from {customize_link}.
lfg.no_channel_text: Looking for a group? Make sure to tag the game you're playing and check out the LFG channels!
lfg.no_game_detected: No game alias detected in the referenced message.

fafo.warning_text:
If you cannot abide by the rules from previous responses,
**Click Below To FAFO**
fafo.timeout_message: You have been timed out for {duration} minutes.
fafo.no_permission_message: I don't have permission to timeout you. Please check my role position and permissions.

colors.title: Server Colors & Levels
colors.how_to_earn:
**How do I get a color?**
Colors are earned automatically through activity! You gain XP by:
‚Ä¢ Sending messages in text channels
‚Ä¢ Spending time in voice channels (with at least 1 other person)

noaccess.text:
**Can't access a channel?**
Some channels require specific roles to view. To get access:
‚Ä¢ Head to {customize_link} to grab the roles you need
‚Ä¢ Look for game-specific roles, community roles, or special interest roles
‚Ä¢ Once you have the role, the channel will appear!

promote.title: Promote Your Content
promote.text:
We have a channel to promote your content. Here's what to do to access it:
‚Ä¢ Click on Parental Advisory and find "Linked Roles" as can be seen below
‚Ä¢ Add your socials in the pop-up window
‚Ä¢ You should now have access to the "Streaming" Category and are allowed to post your content in #promoteyourself
